title: Betty La Fea, La Historia Continúa
overview: Betty La Fea, The Story Continues tells the story of the iconic Beatriz Pinzón Solano 20 years after the conclusion of the original show. While an empowered and wiser Betty works hard on rebuilding her relationship with her teenage daughter Mila, her relationship with Armando begins to deteriorate, making her question if she made the right decision 20 years ago.
